Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Now track your Spotify, Hulu and Stash accounts in Mint

Other improvements:
- Cleaner and smoother app launch
- Added a + button on the front page to make it easier to add accounts

Issues fixed:
- Sometimes the app was closing automatically during launch and had to be re-launched again.
- Account balances were not getting updated on Apple Watch
- Login screen on 12.9 inch iPad Pro was not proper
- Slider in adding new budget screen was displaying very big fonts
- Multiple crashes

Fixed issues:
- Multiple UI and font related issues in iOS 13
- Users in Canada were not able to search and add for certain financial institutions
- Calendar events for Credit Score update was not getting cleared on logout for certain users
- Other bugs

6.12.0, 6.12.1:
- Fixed an issue where accounts were not getting refreshed for some users
- Fixed an issue where transaction tags were not displayed in iPad
- Fixed an issue where adding an account by clicking on an email link wasn't working for some new users.
- Fixed a crash happening to some users who abandon the add account process in between
- Fixed multiple other crashes and bugs

6.11.0
- 3x improvement in Launch time
- 30% reduction in app size

Mint's biggest update for iPhone:
REFRESHED LOOK. Now Mint is sleeker and easier than ever.
NEW MINTSIGHTS™. The new Mint puts money smarts in your pocket. MintSights are personalized money insights that make your data work harder for you.

Mint's biggest update for iPhone:

Now track your Spotify, Hulu and Stash accounts in Mint

Other improvements:
- Cleaner and smoother app launch
- Added a + button on the front page to make it easier to add accounts

Issues fixed:
- Sometimes the app was closing automatically during launch and had to be re-launched again.
- Account balances were not getting updated on Apple Watch
- Login screen on 12.9 inch iPad Pro was not proper
- Slider in adding new budget screen was displaying very big fonts
- Multiple crashes

Issues fixed:
- Fixed an issue where CAPTCHA question was incorrectly displayed while adding certain bank accounts
- In bills card, display aggregate total for the current month instead of displaying total for next 30 days. Also displaying the largest due/overdue bill.
- More crash fixes and improvements

Issues fixed:
- Fixed an issue where CAPTCHA question was incorrectly displayed while adding certain bank accounts
- In bills card, display aggregate total for the current month instead of displaying total for next 30 days. Also displaying the largest due/overdue bill.
- More crash fixes and improvements

Issues fixed:
- Fixed an issue where CAPTCHA question was incorrectly displayed while adding certain bank accounts
- In bills card, display aggregate total for the current month instead of displaying total for next 30 days. Also displaying the largest due/overdue bill.
- More crash fixes and improvements

This version:
- Fixed an issue where Paycheck was getting listed in Budgets for some users.
- Bugs & Crash fixes

Previous version:
- Fixed an issue where CAPTCHA question was incorrectly displayed for certain bank accounts
- In bills, we have moved to displaying aggregate total for the current month instead of the total for next 30 days. Also, now displaying the largest due/overdue bill.
- Other bugs and crash fixes

Our 2019 resolution was to lose weight and be more active. We have been hitting the gym for last 3 months and the results are out now. We have cut down on 30% of the fat and we launch up to 3 times faster.

Let us know how we are doing by leaving us a review.

What's New:
- Introducing a completely revamped Overview page
- Goals on Mobile (being rolled out slowly)
- Credit Score Card on overview will show if you credit score change compared to the last update
- A new goals details page
- A new screen to see all your goals at one place
- Multiple UI Improvements in Goals flow
- Prompt for Uncategorized transactions in Overview will only consider last 3 months of transactions

Issues fixed:
- Sometimes net worth was showing as empty in the bottom sticky view
- Overview page was scrolling back to the top after going to another screen and coming back
- For some small-screen devices, few large numbers in Accounts card were getting truncated
- Multiple other bugs and crashes
